# Curse Data

This is a [Curve Data](https://puzz.link/rules.html?curvedata) variant - instead of normal Curve Data clues, each clue gives the number of horizontal (in the top left) and vertical (in the bottom right) segments in the figure that overlaps that clue.

Two example puzzles with their solutions (click to solve on Penpa+):
[![Example 1](../../images/puzzles/2024/exampleCurseData1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&a=Rcq7CQAwDEPBXVSrkeN8djHefw2HuAioOMSLSAa0qE2B0KHNJxs0b3l/t/zLAg==)
[Solution to example 1](../../images/puzzles/2024/exampleCurseData1SOLUTION.png)

[![Example 2](../../images/puzzles/2024/exampleCurseData2.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&a=Rc3BCQAhDETRXnKew2YSXa1F7L8Nww6ykMPD+eBaG8t8gB1uMJ/g84kOTqmDrzQQ6moKvUUiKbW7ljKkfrusrpXqv//2AQ==)
[Solution to example 2](../../images/puzzles/2024/exampleCurseData2SOLUTION.png)

Click the image to solve on Penpa+.
[![Click to solve on Penpa+](../../images/puzzles/2024/curseData1.png)](https://swaroopg92.github.io/penpa-edit/#m=solve&&)
